landing.title: Idélabbet
landing.subtitle: Collaborate, brainstorm and create together
landing.facilitatorDesc: Create and manage workshops with multiple boards and questions
landing.participantDesc: Join a workshop with a code and share your ideas
landing.feature1Desc: Create multiple boards with different themes and time limits
landing.feature2Desc: Participate together and see ideas grow in real-time
landing.feature3Desc: Get AI-powered insights and summaries of workshop results
landing.feature4Desc: Generate QR codes and sharing links for easy access

dashboard.title: My Workshops
dashboard.noWorkshopsDesc: Create your first workshop to get started

createWorkshop.noBoardsDesc: Add at least one board to the workshop

createWorkshop.draftSavedDesc: Your workshop has been saved as a draft
createWorkshop.title: Workshop Title
createWorkshop.editWarning: This workshop already has participant responses

join.workshopNotActiveDesc: This workshop is not active yet

boardView.movedToNext: You have been moved to the next exercise

aiAnalysisDialog.copySuccessDesc: Analysis has been copied to clipboard
